Name: Alice Johnson
Subject: Cannot access my account after password reset
Description: I reset my password yesterday but still cannot log into the system. I've tried multiple browsers and cleared my cache. The system keeps saying 'Invalid credentials' even though I'm using the new password.

Name: Bob Martinez
Subject: Dashboard loading very slowly
Description: The main dashboard takes over 2 minutes to load. This started happening 3 days ago. My internet connection is fine and other websites load normally.

Name: Carol Williams
Subject: Feature request: Export data to Excel
Description: It would be very helpful if we could export our ticket data to Excel format. Currently we can only view it on screen which makes reporting difficult.

Name: David Chen
Subject: Error message when submitting forms
Description: Getting 'Validation Error 500' when trying to submit any form in the system. This is blocking all our operations. Browser console shows JavaScript errors.

Name: Emma Thompson
Subject: Mobile app not syncing with web version
Description: Changes made on the mobile app don't appear on the web version and vice versa. We need data to sync across all platforms.

Name: Frank Rodriguez
Subject: Unable to upload files larger than 5MB
Description: System gives error when trying to upload files over 5MB. We need to upload presentation files that are typically 10-15MB. Can the limit be increased?

Name: Grace Lee
Subject: Two-factor authentication not working
Description: I enabled 2FA but I'm not receiving SMS codes. I've checked my phone number multiple times and it's correct. My carrier is Verizon.

Name: Henry Wilson
Subject: Request for user training session
Description: Our team of 12 people needs training on the new features released last month. Can we schedule a virtual training session next week?

Name: Iris Patel
Subject: Data backup and recovery procedures
Description: We need documentation on how data backup works and what the recovery procedures are in case of system failure. This is for our compliance audit.

Name: Jack Brown
Subject: Integration with third-party API failing
Description: Our integration with the payment processor API started failing yesterday. Getting 401 unauthorized errors. API keys haven't changed.

Name: Kelly Davis
Subject: Security concern about data encryption
Description: As a law firm, we need to ensure all client data is properly encrypted. Can you provide details about encryption methods used for data at rest and in transit?

Name: Luis Garcia
Subject: Account billing discrepancy
Description: We were charged for 15 users this month but we only have 12 active users. Please review our account and adjust the billing accordingly.

Name: Maria Gonzalez
Subject: Calendar integration not working with Outlook
Description: The calendar sync with Microsoft Outlook stopped working after the latest update. Events created in your system don't appear in Outlook calendar.

Name: Nathan Kim
Subject: Performance issues during peak hours
Description: System becomes very slow between 2-4 PM EST daily. Response times increase from 2 seconds to 30+ seconds. This affects our productivity significantly.

Name: Olivia Anderson
Subject: Lost all data after system maintenance
Description: After last night's maintenance window, all our project data from the past month is missing. This is critical as we have client deliverables due this week.

Name: Peter Jackson
Subject: Unable to generate monthly reports
Description: The report generation feature is stuck at 'Processing...' for over an hour. This happens every time I try to generate monthly financial reports.

Name: Quinn Taylor
Subject: Image upload quality is being reduced
Description: When I upload high-resolution images, they appear compressed and pixelated. As a photography business, we need to maintain original image quality.

Name: Rachel Green
Subject: Email notifications not being sent
Description: Team members are not receiving email notifications for new assignments. We've checked spam folders and email settings. The notification feature seems broken.

Name: Steve Miller
Subject: Timezone display issues for global team
Description: Timestamps are showing in different timezones for team members in different countries. We need all times to display in user's local timezone.

Name: Tina Foster
Subject: Social media integration not posting
Description: The automatic social media posting feature stopped working. We've reconnected our Facebook and Twitter accounts but posts still aren't going through.

Name: Victor Chang
Subject: Search function returning incorrect results
Description: When searching for products, the results include items that don't match the search terms. The search algorithm seems to have issues with partial matching.

Name: Wendy Liu
Subject: Need HIPAA compliance documentation
Description: As a healthcare provider, we need detailed HIPAA compliance documentation for your system. This is required for our annual compliance review.

Name: Xavier Torres
Subject: CAD file uploads not supported
Description: We need to upload AutoCAD files (.dwg) but the system doesn't support this format. Can you add support for architectural drawing files?

Name: Yuki Tanaka
Subject: Multi-language support request
Description: Our international clients need the interface in Japanese and Spanish. Currently only English is available which limits our usage.

Name: Zoe Parker
Subject: Video embedding feature not working
Description: Cannot embed workout videos from YouTube or Vimeo. The embed codes don't render properly and show blank spaces instead of videos.

Name: Adam White
Subject: Bulk data import is failing
Description: Trying to import 5000 records via CSV but the process fails at around 2000 records with timeout error. File format is correct as per documentation.

Name: Betty Clark
Subject: Print formatting is broken
Description: When printing reports, the formatting is completely wrong. Text is cut off, tables are split awkwardly, and some sections don't print at all.

Name: Carlos Rivera
Subject: Audio file playback issues
Description: Audio files uploaded to the system play very quietly and sometimes with static. Original files play fine in other applications.

Name: Diana Prince
Subject: System crashes when handling large datasets
Description: Application crashes when working with datasets over 10,000 records. Browser becomes unresponsive and we have to restart. This limits our analytical capabilities.

Name: Eric Johnson
Subject: API rate limiting too restrictive
Description: Current API rate limit of 100 calls per hour is too low for our booking system. We need at least 1000 calls per hour during peak travel seasons.

Name: Fiona Walsh
Subject: Inventory sync issues with warehouse system
Description: Product inventory numbers don't match between your system and our warehouse management system. This causes overselling and stockout issues.

Name: George Martin
Subject: Barcode scanner integration not working
Description: Our handheld barcode scanners cannot input data into your web forms. We need proper barcode integration for warehouse operations.

Name: Helen Carter
Subject: Database search is case-sensitive
Description: Users have to type exact capitalization to find records. This is user-unfriendly. Please make the search case-insensitive.

Name: Ivan Petrov
Subject: Graphical charts not displaying correctly
Description: All charts and graphs show as blank or with incorrect data points. This started after the last system update. Data is there but visualization is broken.

Name: Julia Adams
Subject: Color picker tool not saving selections
Description: When using the color picker for product customization, selected colors don't save properly. Customers can't complete their custom orders.

Name: Kevin Thompson
Subject: Geographic mapping feature missing coordinates
Description: The map view doesn't show accurate GPS coordinates for our service locations. Some locations appear in wrong countries.

Name: Linda Roberts
Subject: Recipe calculator giving wrong measurements
Description: When scaling recipes up or down, the ingredient measurements are mathematically incorrect. This affects our food preparation and costs.

Name: Michael Scott
Subject: Customer portal login redirects to wrong page
Description: After customers log in, they're redirected to admin dashboard instead of customer portal. This shows them data they shouldn't see.

Name: Nancy Drew
Subject: Advanced search filters not working
Description: Multiple filter combinations return no results even when data exists. Simple searches work but complex filtering is broken.

Name: Oscar Martinez
Subject: Currency conversion rates outdated
Description: The system is using exchange rates from 6 months ago for international transactions. This causes significant financial discrepancies.

Name: Paula Chen
Subject: Appointment scheduling double-booking clients
Description: The scheduling system is allowing multiple appointments at the same time slot. This creates conflicts and unhappy customers.

Name: Quincy Adams
Subject: Team statistics calculations are incorrect
Description: Player performance statistics don't add up correctly. Win-loss records, averages, and percentages show wrong numbers.

Name: Rita Hayworth
Subject: Ticket sales system charging wrong prices
Description: Premium seats are being sold at regular prices and discounted tickets are charging full price. Revenue calculations are all wrong.

Name: Samuel Jackson
Subject: Audit trail logs are incomplete
Description: User activity logs are missing entries for critical actions. This fails our security compliance requirements for audit trails.

Name: Teresa Martinez
Subject: Weather widget showing wrong location data
Description: Travel weather information displays data for wrong cities. Showing New York weather when location is set to Los Angeles.

Name: Ulysses Grant
Subject: Document version control not tracking changes
Description: Multiple users editing documents but version history isn't saving properly. We're losing track of who made what changes when.

Name: Victoria Secret
Subject: Size chart calculator giving wrong recommendations
Description: Customers enter measurements but get incorrect size recommendations. This leads to returns and customer dissatisfaction.

Name: William Shakespeare
Subject: Text editor not saving formatting
Description: Rich text formatting (bold, italic, fonts) gets lost when saving documents. All text reverts to plain format.

Name: Xena Warrior
Subject: Workout timer not counting correctly
Description: Exercise timing feature counts too fast - 60-second intervals finish in about 45 seconds. Affects all timed workouts.

Name: Yasmin Ahmed
Subject: Patient records showing incorrect allergies
Description: Critical issue: Patient allergy information is being mixed up between records. This is a serious safety concern that needs immediate attention.

Name: Zachary Taylor
Subject: Voting system allowing duplicate submissions
Description: Members can vote multiple times on the same issue. The system should prevent duplicate votes from same user ID.
